Tagline: When does a Muslim woman become entitled to maintenance within a marriage?
Under what circumstances, if any, may a husband be excused from his marital obligation?
Judges in family law must act as reformers and adopt gender-sensitive language.
The institution of amicus ensures informed and inclusive adjudication.
